Articles.Content:
Here\'s my kerbin ghetto Icarus 1/2 copy.

I can\'t get it to break earths gravity and head on towards the sun.

No I\'m still working on that, i made a smaller version and managed it with that. But this beast has trouble.

I can at least get it into orbit, and then i just need to wait for docking so i can strap more engines to it and fire it away.

I however didn\'t try sling shotting it around the moon, but i think it had trouble even getting that far out.

Great movie, awesome soundtrack fantastic ship!

But I do believe you might want to make that alittle bigger for a proper replica, however, it is awesome as-is. Nice job!
A ship with an manhattan-sized nuke heading for the sun? Sound very Kerbal to me.
Wow! That rocks! Good job man, good job indeed.
Oh sweet lord, that\'s a might fine beast :L
I can\'t load it because I\'m missing some kind of red light part. I couldn\'t find a version that works with your craft on the forums so could you just post the part file?
Quick! Someone make a solar panel in the shape of a piece of pie, so we can have true parabola panels
That is great. Just great. I\'d fly that into the sun.
